name: Mirror Angel's Paradise
description: Explore the remains of the tower Babil and encounter the terrible images left behind by those driven into madness. Rescue the artisan relics that reflect the old world and give you power as you explore the new.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2+ GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
